works.description:
The (pornographic) image published under the link below is not Rosemarie Benedikts product, nor in any way related to her, or her work. The domain www.rosemarie-benedikt.com, which has been falsely cited in the image description, is owned by Rosemarie Benedikt to represent her work as a ceramic artist.
In a Google search for images related to "Rosemarie Benedikt", the pornographic image appears in the search results and is falsely presented as "by Rosemarie Benedikt".
As a reaction to our previous complaint to the Blogger Team, the actual posting that contained the image has been removed.
But in a google search for images with search text "Rosemarie Benedikt", the now dead link to the false content still appears (currently No. 17 at google.de).

Please remove the pornographic image and/or any reference to Rosemarie Benedikt or www.rosemarie-benedikt.com as soon as possible.
Best regards,
Erik Egerer
Austria
